mapper.sql: p.post_id postId, p.post_code postCode, p.post_name postName, p.post_level postLevel, p.post_type postType, p.post_status postStatus, p.read_only readOnly, p.create_user createUser, p.create_dept createDept, p.create_time createTime, p.update_user updateUser, p.update_dept updateDept, p.update_time updateTime, p.remark
mapper.select: select d.dept_id, d.dept_id || '-' || p.post_id child_id, p.post_name, d.dept_name || '/' || p.post_name as content from sys_dept d left join sys_dept_post dp on d.dept_id = dp.dept_id left join sys_post p on dp.post_id = p.post_id

select
from sys_dept_post dp, sys_post p where dp.dept_id = #{post.deptId} and p.post_id = dp.post_id
from sys_post p where 1 = 1
and p.post_type = #{post.postType}
and p.post_name like concat('%', #{post.postName}, '%')
order by p.post_type, p.post_id

select t.parent_id parentId,
from sys_post p left join sys_post_tree t on p.post_id = t.post_id where p.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_post(post_code,post_type,post_level,post_name,post_status,remark, create_user, update_user, create_dept, update_dept, create_time, update_time) values(#{postCode},#{postType},#{postLevel},#{postName},#{postStatus},#{remark}, #{accessUserId},#{accessUserId},#{accessDeptId},#{accessDeptId},#{accessTime},#{accessTime})
mapper.update: update sys_post set post_code = #{postCode}, post_type = #{postType}, post_name = #{postName}, post_level = #{postLevel}, post_status = #{postStatus}, remark = #{remark}, update_user = #{accessUserId}, update_dept = #{accessDeptId}, update_time = #{accessTime} where post_id = #{postId}

mapper.select: with recursive tree (post_id, parent_id) as (select t1.post_id, t1.parent_id from sys_post_tree t1 where post_id = #{postId} union select t2.post_id, t2.parent_id from sys_post_tree t2 join tree on t2.parent_id = tree.post_id) select distinct tree.post_id from tree JOIN sys_post u on tree.post_id = u.post_id

select sys_post_tree.post_id id, sys_post_tree.parent_id pid, sys_post.post_name as label from sys_post_tree left join sys_post ON sys_post_tree.post_id = sys_post.post_id order by sys_post_tree.parent_id, sys_post_tree.post_id
